title: Lynda - Video for Photographers 02: Filmmaking on Location
description:
Lynda - Video for Photographers 02: Filmmaking on Location

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 28m Appropriate for all Aug 21, 2015   | Uploaded in Jan 9, 2015 by 2boweb
Subjects: Photography Video 
Author: Eduardo Angel 

If you are transitioning from still photography to video, you already have a substantial set of skills. But it helps to see techniques unique to filmmaking, like camera movement, continuous lighting, and recording sound, in action.â€¨â€¨Join Emmy-winning filmmaker Eduardo Angel on set at a beautiful winery in Oregon, where he captures stills, video, and sound for a promotional clip. Witness all the steps, from concept to delivery, from the perspective of a two-man crew, traveling light and working with a limited budgetâ€”a situation most shooters encounter nowadays. â€¨â€¨Eduardo covers topics such as location scouting, working with available light, and getting great interviews. He also shows his favorite gear and even shares tips on packing! â€¨â€¨Make sure to watch Video for Photographers 01: Filmmaking Essentials to brush up on the key technical concepts.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Establishing the best time of day to shoot
	â€¢	Selecting and packing equipment
	â€¢	Getting the right coverage
	â€¢	Working with natural and artificial light
	â€¢	Recording soundscapes
	â€¢	Backing up your footage
	â€¢	Editing in Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe Lightroom
	â€¢	Delivering the final video to your clients
